content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my back yard around 3am having a smoke. as i sat there i look at the night sky in an easterly direction.I noticed two airliners in the sky at that time, one in the northeast sky and the other in the southeast sky.At this time i saw what looked like three lights in a triangle formation across the sky from the east.Then the lights started to move around each other in a clockwise direction. at the same time the three lights started to move to the north very fast and very high out of my sight.
this all took place in around 30 seconds.I was very excited about the whole thing.It covered the entire sky within my view in less than half a minute, thats got to be moving very fast.
content.summary: 3 star like lights moving very high & very fast from east in triangle formation started to move around each other and move to the north

content.detailedDescription: I was first mate on gulf king 6,a shrimp boat.I was standing watch and talking with friends on the radio,when i noticed what i at first thought was a helicopter come from behind an oil platform about 2 miles from us.It was broad daylight,and clear about 8 am in the morning.There was approximatly seven boats towing together when this happened,so as the object came closer,people became silent on the radio until you could of heard a pin drop.Being further away than the others i was the last to realize this was no helicipter.This object literally wove its flight path in and out amongst the boats and did it slowly.It finally came towards my boat and i just couldnt decide what to do when it came to a complete stop.It was less than a football field dead ahead of my boat and tilted at a slight angle about 75 ft. off the water.After about 2 minutes of just staring at this flying saucer i reached behind me for the binoculars,and turned my head just enough to see them.As i did so i saw a streak in my peripheral vision,and so i grabbed the binoculars and swept the sky from position angle 1-6 and 360 to no avail.About the same time every one started talking about what we had just seen and how fast it was.The radio and electronics on the boat never fluctuated or ceased to work.We all watched this thing for a good 10 minutes and saw it close up.It was real,and i have never seen it again
content.summary: Ufo crossed the sky and came to within 200 yds of us and stopped in sky at 15  degree angle.It took off and was out of sight in 3 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Pulling up to the intersection of 360 and route 129.  at ernie's resturant.  i wanted to take a picture of the clouds as the storm was rolling in.  i did not see object until i downloaded to the computer.  thought it looked strange.
content.summary: Driving home and saw a really mean looking cloud.  had camera and decided to photograph.  took shoot of the clouds as a storm was rolling in.  one while driving and the other when i stop at a light.  was suprised to see such a thing on only the two photos

content.detailedDescription: My uncle vern reported the following event on a christmas visit, he was in the front yard of his sons home in texas when vern noticed a dark slit moveing toward them, they watched as this object went over them both with no noise, he told me it was flat had 3 recessed light like in a ceiling, it appeared to be at 2500 feet they watched as it moved out of veiw, my uncle is not one for lieing, he said he saw this object then its something to ponder on. im making this report on his behalf as he may have further details of thickness and the size.Note the object was moving from corner to corner with one sticking out side ways?
content.summary: Triangle with 3 recessed lights moving at an odd angle

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking at moon through telescope when the ufo flew throug line of site. it's shape was a long wedge shape much longer that wide.
 it had no lights at all, it appeard to be closer to moon than to earth. it appeared to be very large.As soon as it crosed the moon it disapeared in the darkness. no sound.
it gave the impression to be floating, i wish that i could have had a photo no time to get camera and load film. in relations to earth it was traveling north north east.
clifford mahan    ps there is not any airplane on earth like this.
content.summary: Long triangle seen through 12.5 inch telescope against moon background power on scope was just enough to see only moon in it.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in front of my house in my drive way with my mother and my neighbor. i was looking up at the sky, i was remarking on how bright the stars were that night. we don't have any street lights in our development. apparently we live near an observatory. there was a large bright light that shot across the sky to low to be a shooting star. the light shot through the clouds and then disappeared. the three of us looked at each other and in amazement we all said at the same time, what in the world was that. we all were scared. needless to say we all felt uneasy. the object was traveling fast but not but slow enough to describe. i saw a tail on the end of it glowing blue light. this could be explained as allot of things, i figured i would let you people know about it. i don't expect this really has any weight to you guys. i thought i needed to share this you. i saw your program tonight i thought i would let you know.
content.summary: A bright light that shot accross the sky in the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
Above times are from memory around 1953. i was working at air force plant 66 (old abandoned bomb factory from ww ii) while a civilian employee of phillips petroleum company. i'd been recruited while employed in the labatory of phillips refinery in kansas city, kansas.
phillips had developed a lab model of a solid jato unit at bartlesville, oklahoma and we were developing a working model with live firings. 
i was posted at "proving grounds" a distance from area "f" on the reservation requiring driving to "f". my immediate supervisor was at "f", a small one story building with an adjacent parking lot.
i'd come to "f" for some sort of business with my supervisor. just inside the doorway on the left was an office, not my supervisor's. there was this fellow in there whom i'd never spoken with and had no idea what his name was. (all kinds of "secret" and "confidential" protocol around the place) 
however, on this particular day, as i was entering the building he called, "horn!" i wasn't even aware he knew me! i acknowledged him and he got up from his desk and said, "did you see that flying saucer out there when you came in?" i recall remarking, "no, but i saw the cup and spoon." it wasn't unusual for remarks about going to the moon some day and such around the place.  "come outside." i joined him in the parking lot where he pointed up toward the sky and said, "see that?" i didn't see anything and he persisted in drawing my attention towards the sky. finally i saw a round disk shaped object, sort of like dull dark aluminum in color. it appeaared about like looking at a lead pencil head on. he asked me, "what do you think?" i really wasn't sure and suggested a weather balloon___maybe? i'd no more said that than the object abruptly moved in a straght line for a very short distance. he then said, "have you ever seen a weather balloon do that?' i, of course, answered, "no". then i recall him saying, "now you've seen one. we used to see them all the time at los alamos." with that he turned and walked back inside and i followed and went on to my supervisor's office to take care of the business i'd come for.
to this day, i really have no idea what i was seeing. it was too far away and had no distinguishing features.
the only other strange and unusual thing i recall was when i was about twelve years old and was coming home late at night from a movie theater. as i was walking near my home i heard a definite spewing noise far above me which seemed to be traveling from the southwest to the northeast. i could see nothing but could clearly hear the sound. it was similar to when one breaks (bends) a firecracker and then lights the exposed powder. that best describes the sound. whatever it was it didn't seem to be moving particularly fast.
by the way, that twelve year old reference? i'm seventy-four now.
do either of these incidents seem familiar to you?
i watch with interest the history channel programs on ufo and read as well. i can only consider the roswell incident and the one at the air base in england really worthy of much consideration. 
while on a day off (policeman at the time in kck) there was a reported incident during my normal shift time in which there was much radio traffic of some sort of "sighting." i talked to a fellow officer in which he related how two men came to his house shrotly after the incident. they seemed only interested in the distance (in degrees) the object was from the horizon. one, he said, mentioned some sort of oil spot that had been found on the desert floor in nm (the roswell incident?) that had turned out to be, according to news reports at the time, ordinary 20 wt. motor oil. the fellow told him it wasn't motor oil.
of course, from my personal experience working in that refinery lab, there was no  test that would determine the viscosity of an oil by sampling some sandy samples. 
who knows? like i said, the only two incidents that seem worth serious consideration are roswell and the air base in england. i don't give a lot to my two incidents since i don't really have any information other than what i mentioned.
that said, i appreciate that some organization is checking out whatever is happening. some must be true.
content.summary: Was shown object in clear blue sky

content.detailedDescription: This is not just an ufo report. a couple of weeks ago me and my friend videotaped a ufo landing in a field. we were at a local elementry school filming stunts we were doing off the playground equipment (i.E. slides, jungle gyms, and swings) when my friend was blinded by the object and nearly missed a pole he jumping to. we started recording the metallic looking object. the flash in his eyes was like being cuaght in the wrong position of a mirror and the sun. the object flew around a bit as if looking for something. it started to descend into a field. we ran straight towards it because it was blocked by some trees. when got into view of the object it had already touched ground. the object looked like a giant flat cd with a slightly domed tope and was made of shiny metal with no windows or doors from what we could tell. we couldnt tell what kept it propped up on the ground. we recorded it on the ground for about a 30 second period before it lifted off the ground and sped off toward the mountains at lightning fast speeds. about 3-4 minutes later 6 camo-colored helicopters raced after it. that night we made 3 copies of the tape. then the next day we drove down the fort carson military base. we didn't have ids to get into the base so we showed the tape the to the gate guards. they took our phone numbers, addresses, and a copy of the tape. they took us very seriously. we heard nothing from them until a few days ago. we were just hanging out at his house when his bell ringed. he answered the door and two men were standing there and asked his name. my friend replied and they shoved their way into the house. the two men looked almost identical, wore black suits, very pale skin as they had never been in the sun before, they were bald and spoke in monotone, the only color on thier face was their very red lips. they sat down with us and started asking us questions. they ased if we showed anyone else the tapes, like the media. we told them that we sent a tape to the gazette, local newspaper. after about 10 minutes of questioning us about what we saw, by the way they wrote nothing down, they asked to see the two remaining tapes. we got the tapes and put one in the vcr and one of the men wanted to see the actual tape. as soon as the tape was done we gave the other one to them, then they started to get violent. they said if anyone asked if they were there to say no, if anyone asked about the tapes we were to say it was a hoax, if we told anyone about what we saw that day they would "lock up all our families and make sure nobody remembered us." they then continued to start searching his house. my girlfriend later said two men came by with a warrent to search the property. at my friend's house they even came across about an ounce marijuana and tossed it aside as if it were just another piece of paper. they the left abruptly. we now have no evidence of what we saw. you now understand why i have to remain unknown.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Government people came to my house.

content.detailedDescription:
I was going home from a friend's home (rita whitaker) walking between the nco housing to the officers housing where i lived in the late 60's.  i got to the officer's housing side of the road separating the two housing areas.  i remember the area where i stopped as a dry playground area with a large swing set. i remember stopping dead in my tracks because i knew something was there then over me, and then a bright light that lit up everything around me including the swing set. i do not remember noise to speak of.  i don't remember feeling fear.  the thing seemed to just be sitting above me.  i then remember me just in awe or something limp and not moving, and standing looking up seeing a round or round-like shape on at least the part that i could see though the light.  the bright light went out and then i could see more of the colored lights and the it was gone.  i don't remember being able to see it leave, it just seemed to be there and then not there.  all i remember after that was a feeling that unexplained time had passed by because it was now dusk and getting cooler, and after it left it was dark and i started to run home.  i vividly remember feeling like i had to hurry because i was going to get into bug trouble for not being home by dark.  i also felt that this incident was overwith as fast as it started.  it seemed like an instant but at the same time much more than an instant in time.  my parents never remembered, but i remember my mother saying something about my sunburn.  off and on through the years i have questioned my father about things.  he says he has no knowledge of a ufo sighting that would have been so close to luke afb during his station.  he was a pilot.  i know something unexplainable happened to me, and i know it was not a helicopter or other explainable aircraft of that day.  i knew this when it happened, and i know it today.  i have told close friends, sisters, and parents of this incident; but no one cares much to hear about it.  they just shake their heads and say they don't have any doubt i say something as a child that was unexplainable.  i feel disconnected sometimes, because i don't think they do understand.  it makes me feel like a looney tune. this experience did happen to me, and even at the age i was; i was smart enough to remember things all these years. i yearn to talk to others who may have had an experience, but i don't know anyone.  i don't remember the exact date and time, but know that it was either during the last year or the year before the last year that we lived on luke afb.  and, i don't remember it being horribly hot.  so i don't believe this happened during summer months.  i wrote about this one other time somewhere on-line, but didn't hear anything back.  i can't even remember what the website was now.  not too much to report, no pictures, and no other witnesses that i am personally aware of.  however, i have always had this desire to know more about ufo's, since this encounter.  i am facinated by anything i can watch, and read searching for things that support my own sighting and feelings.  i don't know if it means anything, but after this sighting i have had strong feelings about some things before they actually happen.  i guess you might call them premenitions.  also, with no seizure or epilepsy history on either sude of my families; i had a seizure at the age of 46.  i had heard something on a program that either all or nearly all of the men on a famous ufo case had seizures later in life after their sighting/abduction. who really knows if anything is related to a single incident.  i feel like an infant trying to soak in everything i can learn to come that much closer to some kind of answer for this unknown, strange, and before it happened unimaginable experience.  i saw a hypnotherepist on t.V., and wonder how much money it would cost me to see if there is more that i can't remember on the surface or to verify that something did happen to me.  i feel connected to something out there and don't know what it is.  is there any information you can provide like any other case like mine that was close or on luke a.F.B. during the time that i am reporting?  

thank you for allowing me to at least document this. i hope that whoever reads this will understand my curiosity and unending desire to search for answers.

heidi maule
content.summary: My father was stationed at luke afb ~1966-1969,  i was born in 1958. there are things i remember from one evening to this day.

content.detailedDescription: I was on delmar road, about three miles out of the town of tahlequah, driving home from dinner that i had with my friend jake and his wife denise when a big flash of light startled me. now, we were in the middle of a thunderstorm watch so it wasn't to be unexpected. but what really confused me was the color of the flash, a bright blue. after the flash, my truck experienced difficulty, total difficulty, in fact it stalled right there in the middle of the street. besides the truck, i noticed that my watch and my cell phone were powerless too. i got out to check out the engine of my truck and i heard this looping sound very similar to a harley davidson, but i was all alone on the road. no one in sight. well, my heart was up in my throat when i looked up in the sky to see this big blue disc-shaped object. it had to have been that object making the noise, and the more i heard this noise the more it sounded less like a motorcycle and the more it sounded like this weird metallic/electrical sound. i know this is going to sound stupid, but the best way to describe the sound is the sound that those ships make in those matrix movies. the thing was just hovering there for the longest time, i stood as still as possible. as the only thing living in the area that i knew of, i didn't want to draw attention to myself. i've heard to many stories about abductions to try and be a brave man now. after what must have been five minutes, the object started going back and forth across the sky. i ducked down, i wanted this to be over. then after a couple minutes of this hovering over the area, it disappeared in the same fantastic blue flash that it came in. as soon as the flash had disappeared, my truck turned back on all by itself as did my cell phone, but my watch was still broken. i know the encounter took 7 minutes and 11 seconds because my watch was stopped at 8:50:49 and when i got into my truck, the clock just turned to 8:58. my phone was another story. when i looked at it, there were 40 missed calls, all of them unknown. i called a few of my friends, including my friend jake asking them if they had seen the object and had called me. but all i got were laughs and confused reactions. i'd like to forget this whole experience, i feel as if i'm going crazy. i saw something about mufon on the history channel, so i thought i'd give you this story to add to your records. i hope that telling the story to someone who wants to hear it will get it out of my system and i can continue living my life.
content.summary: Big flash of blue light, hovered for several minutes, darted around the sky, and then disappeared in flash of blue light.

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out onto my back poarch late in october, 2005, which i do nearly night to check the stars and the weather. i live near the philidelphia airport(30 miles away)flyway and having been a general aviation pilot, i watch airplanes aproachiing the philly area all the time. on this night, i saw what i thought was a star in the southeast, where there should not have been a star, so i whtched it to see if it were a jet aproaching philly. while i watched, it started a zigzag pattern, going counter clockwise and made a 540 degree turn in the space of about 5 to 8 seconds before disappearing. i watched the spot for several minutes and scanned the sky in that area for sometime before think that i may have seen something unusual. the next evening while shopping at the local acma supermarket in elkton, i mention this to my checkout and he said "you aren't going crazy, i saw it too!" we talked about it for several minutes both wondering aloud to whom and how we could report it. 
for myself, i have seen several object that i could not identify and have never before know a place to report them.
this one did not go in a straight line and that is what caught my attention. this is the fifth such objuct i have observed in the past 55 years and the only recent one (three of those i now believe to have been falling space objects, either metors or metoeites).
i lost sight of the object because it just seemed to go out like someone turned off the light or it excellerated so fast that it left my field of vision without my knowing it. it was about 30 degrees above the horizion all the time i observed it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: What i thought was a star, suddenly did a lot of zig zaging and suddenly disappeared .

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard and was bent over getting some stuff out of my trunk and when i stood back up they were just above the horizen directly in front of me.I knew they were ufo's they just hovered in the sky never moving ionly watched for a few seconds then went insidetold my wife but when we came back out they were gone.They looked like upside down pie pans with another smaller dome on top.I was stunned for a second but that was all.After i saw them i would catch myself looking into the sky checking to see if they were back again.This went on for about 2 months i guess.But i have never seen them again.This happened around the time that mars was so visible if this helps pin point the time better.
content.summary: I saw about 5 or 6 in a staggered row across the sky at dusk.
Two objects combing albany sky followed by moving crescent

content.detailedDescription: We were burying our dog who had been hit by a car earlier on in the day. we were at the cranbrook airport (which had been abandoned) just off of dirt road that ran along the side of the airport. it was in the afternoon the sun was over us and there was something that was reflecting the sunlight like a mirror. it was flashing on us while we were burying the dog.The light was coming from behind us. we weren't paying much attention to it. untill my uncle said finally what is that light and he turned around and then said the words look. so we did. and there was a a spinning disc floating in the sky overhead it was so close you could see grain in the steel of the outside of it. it looked all like stainless steel. it wasn't completely semetrical either while it was spinning there were places on the shell that looked like bumps (it wasn't perfectly smooth) and it wobbled a bit. it made no noise and it was so close i think just beyond a stones throw away. all we did was stand there and watch it aprox 5 minutes. it suddenly starting spinning very fast and then in a blink of a eye it was half of the size. it was higher in the sky alot higher. we watched it after it had climbed high in the sky it then moved higher and corkscrewed upwards untill we could not see it anymore. and just as it dissapeared from sight there were 3 us airforce jets that came flying in they were green and had a white star inside of a circle on the wing tips.They came in from different directions. i was 13 there were 8 of us there 3 adults and 5 kids.
content.summary: We seen a floating spinning disc.

content.detailedDescription:
About 10 years ago i was camping at camp cachalot in the plymouth state forest.  most of my troop (including the leaders) were inside a lodge and we were sleeping on the porch.  it started snowing about 3 am and was rather windy so we were all pretty cold and wet.  6 of the 8 of us were up (the 2 closest to the lodge stayed dry) and at roughly 4 am we noticed a single glowing object asscend through the sky.  it was changing colors at a rate of about a color per 5 seconds. it lasted for a good five minutes dancing around in the sky at breakneck speed. it turned at 90 and 180 degree agnles, it stopped on a dime and at one po int it actually turned into 3 objects in the shape of a equilateral triangle.  the color was blue when it dissapered and it was very bright when it blinked out.  
not one of us said a word the entire time and we all were almost in a state of shock. a good few minutes later we started talking about it and decided not to let the others know.  to this day ive been wondering what the hell it is. if you have any information, please email me.  thanks!
content.summary: Solo object seen over camp cachalot

content.detailedDescription:
In 78 my father and i rowed into a lake not accessable by road to stay the wekend and fish. i think i'll loose credibitity when i tell you i was only 11 years old at the time,but my father and i have spoken about this many times and we remember the same things with his memory more detailed than mine. we spent a long physical day getting into the lake and i was young and not long to go to sleep after turning in for the night. my father and i didnt have a tent, we just turned the boat up on its side and put a stick to hold it on a 45degree angle to protect us should it rain. i was asleep and was awoken by my father telling me to look into the sky, i first saw one bright white light, far brighter than any star ive even seen, it was very high in the sky, much higher than airplanes but about the same size as the light on an airplane at regular flying altitude.The first light did an amazing pattern of directions, very quickly changing direction at every angle not just 90 degree turns but every angle you could think of. this light would make about 8-10 turns then stop, all in just seconds, perhaps 2-4 seconds and another bright white lighht would then fly into view from far out and do the exact same pattern in the sky and stop near the first light, then the first one would take off on another zig zagged pattern and again stop, once the first one stopped the second would repeat the firsts pattern.My father and i watched this for about 20 minutes when they suddenly and at the same time took off in a straight up motion and out of sight, they seemed to go out into space, sounds crazy right? i know. anyhow, about 3-4 minutes after they sped off my father saw and showed me another light far off in the sky's distance, this time the light was flashing and traveling straight accross the sky, it only took a few minutes and it got closer and we knew right away it was an airplane, we watched the airplane go accross the sky and eventually out of view, about 4-5 minutes of the plane being out of our sight the unknown bright white light returned, it appeared as though it came straight down from outter space, not accross the sky but down out of the sky, and again started with crazy , very fast zig zagged patterns accross the sky, and again it would stop after 8-10 moves and the second would repeat the firsts design and stop beside it and they repeated this for another half an hour or so and then suddenly at great speed zipped up and out of our view. a few minutes later my father again pointed out a flashing light off in the sky's distance, another plane, we again watched this plane and about 5-7 minutes of the second plane going out of sight the first bright white light returned again. i can add that everytime a plane entered the sky those bright white lights would leave in a hurry and straight up only to come back once the aitrplanes were far away, the planes would often take 10- 15 minutes to get completely out of sight from where they entered out line of sight in the sky, i often fell asleep while waiting for the planes to leave and the white lights to come back, but my father would wake me every time they returned.Speaking with my father he tells me that after a while he coudln't wake me up anymore, well,,, he could wake me but i couldn't stay awake i was just too tired from the days hike,. my father says he watched those two lights in the sky for close to 3 hours and they would do all kinds of different patterns in the sky, they didnt seem to be doing/flying repeated patterns or "directions", if you will? the only consistent things were that they knew a plane was coming far befor we could see it and they would fly into outter space and only come back after the planes were far out of sight, they alweays did one light at a time designs and then the second would do the same directions and stop besides the first over and over again. personally i remember seeing them do this and being interupted 3 time sby airplanes, then i fell slept until moring.
   this all happened back in 78, cam corders were not around back then as you know, nor did we have a camera with us. when my father awoke me and pointed this out in the sky i thought it was what i stil think they were, ufo's, i wasnt scared i think perhaps because i had my father with me, he was my hero and i always felt safe with him around so i didnt feel in danger at all. i nor my father recall these lights being anyhting but bright white, changing shape just slightly if at all, they seemed to be round or disc , they were very very far from us up in the sky, far higher than the planes were flying. this si the best discription i can give of the objects, i lost sight of them when i fell asleep waiting for them to come back and from what my father tells me he too fell asleep after watching them for close to 3 hours and they left due to a plane.
   i realise this is not a very great report, no pictures ot anything of the sort and a very old happening on top of it all.But i assure you this did happen, as sure as i'm sitting here typing this. just thought it might help your data collection if others have reported this to compare it to. i will also add that the airport in cape breton island, nova scotia closes at 6pm it a very small place but the planes we saw are regular sightings there as many planes fly over that area going to and coming from europe
thank you,
robert white.
   for the record. so not to controdict myself in your questions, i now live in the cayman islands, but was born and raised in east cost canada.
   i keep coming back to this part aftyer i read more of your questions and i wish to elaberate on things. this happened when i was young, my father and i had great health back then, however over the years we have both been in very poor health, i have ben inflicted with an unknown problem/condition wheer i take between 2000-3ooomg of morphine every day just to deal with the pain and keep me mobile, yet doctors cant say for sure whats wrong with me, i've heard it all, the only thing doctors havent told me is that im pregnant! my health problems started about 9-10 years after this "sighting" althought i highly doubt they are coneccted, after all, its not like we were close to those lights or anyhting like that.Many years after this sighting my father was put into the hospital wand was there almost 6 months in quarintine, finally one day out of frustration my father left the hospuital with out doctors approval, they never were able to tell him what made him so sick for so long.It took almost 3 yeasrs for the sickness he suffered to go completly away, he is no longer terriably sick all the time but has never experianced god health after that hospital episode. i wanted to ginhve all the details as best and as honestly as i can, i was going to just click that we are both in great health because i dont think these things are realated, but i thought better of it for your research.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Two very fast bright white lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was in my moms bed looking outside the window it was late at night. i saw this big object coming into my view like it was just passing by. as soon as i saw it i thought it was a ufo. the object was like a disc with a very wide cylinder type of shape but not as wide as the base and at the top of the cylinder it was rounded. and in the cylinder part it sort of had window but each window was ultra white. i ran to my mom told her to come when we went to her room and it was gone.
content.summary: Like a disk with a cylinder at the top and at the top it was rounded at the cylinder it had ultra white windows

content.detailedDescription: I know you get far fetched stories sometimes, but maybe you can just help us explain this one. i really don't want to be know, so please excuse the name i sent.... my friends and i were sailing through the hawaiian islands. we were 87 not.Miles south of the big island (hawaii) and finishing up our beers on deck, while buttoning things up for the night. my good friend noticed a bright light under the water, about 12 feet infont of the bow. it gave off three distinct colors, that faded in and out slowly. we called our wives up topside and asked them what they thought it was. we all thought it might be a sub, but then the lights became brighter. the girls got very scared as did we and then whatever it was took off fast. so fast that it rocked our boat. i don't know of anything that could be up and gone, from not a movement to out of sight in seconds. this thing just sat under water and bolted... gone. we saw the lights disapear, as it left. we did not get photos in time, but please do not discard this. it was very real and has stuck with all of us since.
content.summary: 3 colors of light under the water

content.detailedDescription: I was piloting a piper cherokee 140 airplane returning to the gadsden airport after some recreational flying approaching from the north about 5 miles out when i passed the object at about 1000 ft. above ground level.  it was about 20 ft. off of my left wing.  it was about 3 feet in diameter, tan in color, and looked like a weather balloon except that it had no inflation nozzle, no radiosonde attached to it, and it was perfectly round.  weather balloons have a teardrop shape to them when strapped to a weather gathering payload.  i circled back to get a closer look and noticed what appeared to be a red crecent moon or a hammer and sicle shape on it reminicent of the emblem on the former soviet flag.  as i circled around a second time to get closer look, the object moved away from me and maintained a distance of about 50 to 75 yard spacing between itself and my plane.  when i became aware that the object could manuver, i was certainly rattled. i tried to pursue the object about a minute or two but it accellerated away to the point that i could not keep up with it. i was traveling at 120 knotts.  scared, i opted to return to the gadsden airport. when i arrived home, i reported the sighting to the anniston flight service station.  i believe the attendant at the fss was unofficially impressed, but i don't know weather or not he officially filed my report.  i believe the ufo to be either alein, a top secret usa probe, or the russians aren't telling us something. i maintain that what i saw was not a weather balloon and flew under it's own power.  i strongly believe the markings were used camoflage the ufo to be from earth.
content.summary: tan in color,  3ft dia. like a weather baloon but perfectly round with a red crecent moon shape on it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a framing sub contractor building a house in a place called spruce creek fly-in. i had nine guys working for me and the prime contractor was walking up to the house with the rest of us, getting back from lunch. just before we entered the front door, i pointed to an object and asked every one, stop! what the hell is that!I admire aircraft and know the machanics it takes to fly. this wasn't normal. it was dead still, metal, shining as if hot, about 500' up and 300' over, it was about 10 degrees out of plumb. no surface details,on thrust trail,on lights,just hanging there!A cylinder about 40' wide and 80'tall.I asked every one if they even see something at all. they all said ya! i asked each one at a time,what is it. i don't know they said. from laborer to the prime contractor, no explanations. we watched it for about three minutes and every one else lost interest and went to work, i layed down on a stack of plywood and watched it for about 15 minutes longer, but there was on change. evetualy, i went back to work. 5 minutes later i checked on the object and it was gone. i shouldn't have gotten up. every onec in a while i see those guys and quietly ask, remember! they can't deny it. 
i hadn't thought much about it lately, being busy with work and every thing.   (until)!
i was watching t.V. and there it was on a u.F.O. show.
                  the  flying  barrel
p.S. maybe the film was of the same event we saw !
     if so, i would like it on my p.C. wall paper.
content.summary: 11 people saw a hovering matalic  barrel 500' up

content.detailedDescription: I was returning to school in whapiton when this incident took place. i remember it took longer than it normaly would. weeks later, i took my film in to get it developed and found an odd picture. as i looked at it, i started to remember what had happened. its pretty crazy....Anyway you can have this picture if you want it. it looks like a red glowing arch. i'm guessing its about 100 feet away from where i was when i took the picture. i have misplaced the negative. i can send it to you if you let me know where?   p.S. i"m not a kook!
content.summary: Taken from truck somewhere between williston and whapiton n.D.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside to smoke and looked up.  saw a dark circular/ovoid/spherical-type object headed north of me, emerging from behind debs park (highland park area).  small, unresolvable (did not appear to be a lone balloon) climbing slowly and steadily, course east / north-east.  speed constant - was in view for approx. 5 minutes or so.  it was moving against the wind.  no helicopter / jet / airplane noise at all.  there were no visible lights on the object.  it did not perform any anomalous manoeuvres.
content.summary: Dark, circular unidentified object sighted headed east / north-east of my position.

content.detailedDescription: I had heard reports the night before in this small town of people seeing a ufo.  the next night, i was determined to see it also if it came.  i was waiting with my 8 year old daughter on our back patio.  about dusk, here it came. it was silvery in color, had red and green alternating lights around the top of it and was about the size of our 1970 volkswagen.  it was about 30 feet in front of us and was tree top level.  it just moved across the sky in front of us and disappeared on the horizon to our left.  it never ever made a sound.  i reported this to the local police station at that time.  there was a lot of other people in that town that night that saw the same thing and reported it also. i was very fasinated by it since i had seen that same thing back in about 1951 with my grandmother on her front porch when i was about 8 years old.  this event occurred in either the spring, summer, or fall.  the year is an approximate. my timing couldn't be off more than a year or two i think. the incident with my grandmother has been reported also.
content.summary: A silvery disc with red and green alternating lights around the top of it appeared  about 30 feet in front of me at tree top level moving slowly across the sky not making a single sound.

content.detailedDescription: In about summer of 1951, my grandmother and i (i was about 8 yrs old) were sitting on her front porch about dusk on a summer evening. we were staring out in front of her house when all of a sudden a silvery disc about the size of a 1970's volkswagen appeared and was hovering about 3 feet over the gravel road directly in front of her house.  the road was about 30 feet in front of her house. the disc had red and green alternating lights around the top of it. it never ever made a single sound. at that time i had not heard of ufo's and had no idea what it could be. my first thought was that i was very scared and should run in the house at once. my next thought was that "if they were going to get me, they would get me anyway and i wanted to see what was going to happen next."  my grandmother and i looked at each other as if to say, "what is it?" but we never ever said a word to each other or anyone else about it. i told this story for the first time about 10 years later. my grandmother died about 3 years later. to my knowledge, she never told anyone about it. the disc stayed in that position about 5 minutes. it then took off so fast across the field in front of us that it disappeared almost instantly.  i am now a pilot. to my knowledge, there was nothing in our world at that time that could behave in that fashion. i have always been fasinated about mysterious events ever since and particularly ufo phenomenen.  i also saw a disc like this one about 20 yrs later in columbus, in. i will file that report also.
content.summary: Silver disc about the size of a 70's volkswagen appeared about 30 feet in front of me and my grandmother.

content.detailedDescription:
During the year of 1984, at a apartment complex parking lot with my sister, both of us experienced the event, but i did not remember until few years later, when my sister and i were talking. we spoke of the moving lights under a huge circular apparatus above our heads, approximately 100' in the air. i completely forgot what happened, but i sensed or felt that a amount of time was missing.

in 1994, i exprienced the presence of three individuals, a tall skinny entity, brilliant white light image or form, and two other small black beings with reflective dark eyes. i remember looking at the tall entity, when he placed his middle finger in the center of my forehead, after that i don't remember a thing, except that i woke up very weak. after this event i started making very futurisctic drawings of temples, devices, etc. i developed a better sense towards everything that surrounds me, and today, i still very inspired and motivated with everything that has to do with the unknown.

a few years later, by coincidence i discovered a long mark in my genital area, it looks like a perfectly performed laser surgery from top to bottom. 

in addition, i removed a crystal like object from the back of my head. it was so tiny that i dropped it on the ceramic floor, making the sound of piece of crystal. and i was never able to find it.

for samples, please visit my site www.Alezones.Com this is a living proof of how these experiences changed my life for the better.
content.summary: Circular shape with many lights of different colors in 1984, and abduction in 1993

content.detailedDescription: I was with my family in the back of the car and when i first saw it i had this strange feeling that it was not just another plane. i wasn't it flew over the car and i saw that there was 3 other ones where i was heading towards. it was disguised as a plane and the top-right-left corners were white "lights" and the bottom one was a blinking red "light". when it went towards the other ones, it stoped for about 3 seconds and they all just splitted up and "flew" at a really high speed. afterwards i felt really wierd like something is staring at me. i lost sight of these objects when they went behind some trees and one went towards a star... i think it was a star. it was like about two days ago or so.
content.summary: 3 corners were white and one was red in the centre was a faint blue light

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bedroom because i heard this whistling sound. at first i thought it was the wind so i liiked out the window and i saw a cone shaped thing and it was rocking back and fourth. i kept looking at it and then all of a sudden it shot up and i diddn`t see it again
content.summary: Big with a yellow glow and no windows

content.detailedDescription: I was in a truck driving down highway 28 frim marquette towards the makinaw bridge with my friend drew we were driving along and i looked at the clock.  it said 11:40 then i sat back in my seat and something weird happend to me it was like a clip of my life had just been cut out. it was the wierdest feeling. i was inmy chair one second sitting back and then the next second i was leaning forward i looked at the clock and it said 11:52. the  weird part was the same 3 min. song was still playing on the radio. before i could say anything my friend drew looks at me and asks me if i felt "that" that being that missing peice of time that we had both just experienced
content.summary: Missing time

content.detailedDescription:
it all starts in september while i was outside the house contemplating the stars.  i have seen many airplanes in that area but what i saw was completly different. it was like two stars in form and color, one was behind the other and both had the same size and goes at the same speed very slow. i though maybe could be one single object but i keep on watching it and wanting it not to desappear but instantly it desapeared the one in the front first and then the other.  the were no clouds in the sky, it was completely clear...A beautiful night to see the stars.  i remember by that time mars were near the earth and that night it was beside the moon & that was what i was looking for.  but after that day at the same time i went outside i start to see many of them.  at first i start to think they were satellites but they were to many and some travel in group of two...Some were bigger and others get nearer and their light get bigger, very bright...A white light that i ever seen.  they look like stars, if you are watching the sky you are seeing something like a star and then suddenly it begin to move.  usually they appear from nowhere and they desappear in the same way.  always i see them when the first stars begins to appear but never late at night. i moved to virginia on december 27 and i was affraid i wouldn't see those stars again but i was wrong.  i start to see just a few in a night but since a week ago they are starting to appear again...Many of them and on march 27...(i think is not a concidence the date) but it was the fist time i saw a little one getting out of a big one.  i needed to report this because something is happening whatever they are.  i don't have a good zoom camera but i tried to captured them and i took photos of airplanes and those strange moving stars to compare them...They look very different.  i took the photos with a canon ps510 with a tripod i will sent you pictures of both cropped and putting more contrast to make the objects clearer...But i keep the original ones, full resolution for if you need them.  i will keep on taking pictures of them and hopefully by the end of this month i will get a canon eos20d with a 55mm-85mm lense wich is more better to take this kind of pictures.  i can give you the settings of the camera too if you ask.  i want you to believe me because i have seen them very near and i could not see any shape on them just a great white light.  i got worried because i though that maybe that could be radiation but that is why i am here.  you are the experts, please let me know any info you have if you know something about it.  i can show you in person too if we plan a meeting...I think that is the best proof i can give. well that is all by now.

y

note:the first photo below is an airplane, the rest are the objects
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Not just one... many of them

content.detailedDescription:
I was out for a walk in my neighbourhood. while turning a corner, i happened to look up into the sky, and see two very thin, very defined beams of light, ssw of my position, about 45-55 degrees above the horizon. i first thought that these were the aurora borealis, but they were stationary, did not have the pattern of aurora, as i have seen them before, and only changed in brilliance. they also only occupied a very small portion of the sky. the second line, which was orange, then disappeared. the remaining line turned from very light blue, to pure white. i observed this white light, but the glare from the streetlights in the neighbourhood had washed out the object. i made it to a darker area, a pathway, and observed the white beam of light for about 5 minutes, until cloud cover obscured it. 

the object appeared to be simply a line, surrounded by a dull field of light. it was stationary. when i first sighted the object, there were two lines of light next to each other, one orange, and one light blue. the orange line disappeared, and the light blue one turned to white. a field of dull light surrounded the white line, and it then became blocked by cloud cover.

i was stunned by what i saw, and felt that i could not adequately explain it. afterwards, i attempted to scour the news for stories of meteor sightings, or instances of aurora borealis over lower north america, but found nothing.
there were storms over the u.S. midwest at the time, and i wondered if there was any correlation, as my estimate, based on object size, altitude, and position in the sky would place the object in that vicinity.
content.summary: Two lines in the sky, stationary, observed ssw, 45 degrees above the horizon
